H0.text: Air resistance keeps the planets in orbit around the Sun.

H1.text: Friction keeps the planets in orbit around the Sun.

H2.text: Gravity keeps the planets in orbit around the Sun.

H3.text: Magnetism is the force that keeps the planets in orbit around the Sun.

A4.text: Planets orbit the Sun in an ellipse as a consequence of the law of gravity.

A5.text: Gravity is the law that every object with mass attracts every other object in the universe in proportion to each mass and inversely proportional to the square of the distance between them.
